question: Which of the following is NOT a correct statement with respect to Surendranath Banerjee?
option1: He was co-founder of Indian National Association
option2: He was founder of Ripon College in Kolkata
option3: He is known to have evolved National Consciousness as a formal concept
option4: He co-founded Sadharan Brahmo Samaj with Anandmohan Bose
answer: He co-founded Sadharan Brahmo Samaj with Anandmohan Bose
explanation: The fourth statement is not correct. Banarejee had co-founded Indian National Association with Anandmohan Bose but was not related to Sadharan Brahmo Samaj which was created by Bose along with Shibnath Shastri, Sib Chandra Deb, Umesh Chandra Dutta etc.
